genresAdvancedInfo.name: tibetan mantra
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Tibetan mantra music is a meditative form of music that incorporates the chanting of mantras, or sacred words or phrases. It is believed to have healing and transformative powers and is often used in spiritual practices such as yoga and meditation. The music is typically slow and repetitive, with a focus on creating a peaceful and calming atmosphere.

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
